Title: Custom CSharp Controls
Description: The aim of this project is to provide you (the user) with controls that have desired functionality built into them.
HomeWiki:
Project Description
The aim of this project is to provide you (the user) with controls that have desired functionality built into them.

At the moment the only control is an extended textbox that can serve as a numeric textbox or as a letter only textbox with additional properties that can be set.

All ideas and feedback are very welcome!
